name: microwave bowl cozy
notes:
this quick and easy microwave bowl cozy crochet pattern is just that: quick and easy! 

at just twelve rows total, you’ll be finished crocheting and enjoying your microwaved bowl of soup, chili, or hot cereal in no time – and in style – all while protecting your hands from the searing heat of the bowl.

find the video tutorial for this pattern here: https://youtu.be/g6x1uy2sm84
